rooms.description: Entry foyer with Vastu-compliant positioning to welcome positive energy
Integrated living and dining space designed in brutalist style with raw concrete finishes and exposed structural elements
Functional kitchen area with an open layout connected to dining area; placed according to Vastu for auspicious energy flow
Primary bathroom with minimalistic brutalist elements; location ensures privacy and Vastu compliance
Quiet study space integrated into the ground floor with soundproofing and natural light sources
